items.question: What types of images work best?
items.answer: Anime-style illustrations work best, including character art, fan art, stickers, etc. We recommend clear images with visible characters. Real photos or realistic styles may not produce ideal results.

items.question: How do you ensure consistency across multiple generations?
items.answer: Our algorithm extracts key character features (face shape, hair color, outfit, etc.) and maintains them across generations. You can also enable 'Lock Character Features' for enhanced consistency.

items.question: Can I control the background and text?
items.answer: Yes. You can choose 'Character Only' to keep the original background, or 'Full Image' to transform everything. For text in images, you can protect or redraw it.

items.question: Can I use generated images commercially?
items.answer: Pro and above users have commercial rights for original character generations. For fan art of existing IPs, commercial use must comply with the original IP holder's terms.

items.question: Why don't you offer 3D model export?
items.answer: We focus on generating high-quality figure-style images rather than 3D modeling. Image generation is faster and more cost-effective, better suited for quick previews and social sharing.
